content.en: Coagulation optimization: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve blood transfusion and coagulation management in cardiac surgery. These algorithms, such as thromboelastography (TEG) and point-of-care coagulation testing, aim to reduce bleeding, transfusion requirements, and costs. By guiding transfusion therapy and providing timely coagulation intervention, these algorithms have the potential to improve patient outcomes and optimize the management of coagulopathy in cardiac surgery.
content.da: Koagulationsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre blodtransfusion og koagulationsstyring ved hjertekirurgi. Disse algoritmer, såsom tromboelastografi (TEG) og point-of-care koagulationstestning, har til formål at reducere blødning, transfusionsbehov og omkostninger. Ved at guide transfusionsterapi og sikre rettidig koagulationsintervention har disse algoritmer potentiale til at forbedre patientens resultat og optimere håndtering af koagulopati ved hjertekirurgi.
